name: humidly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or contains extremely small drops of water in the air: It’s a typical humidly warm, tropical morning in Panama City. She looked out of the window at the humidly overcast sky and the fields of grass.
More examplesFewer examplesEven in the shade, the air was humidly warm and uncomfortable.It was humidly hot that afternoon and not pleasant at all.It was a cold, grey morning, and a thick white mist had settled humidly upon the coast.
